instruction: Construct a portfolio of 10 stocks using the following categories.
input: Industry: Technology, Risk: High, Geographic location: Global
output: A portfolio of 10 stocks with a focus on high-risk technology stocks from a global geographic location could include Apple Inc., Microsoft Corporation, Amazon.com, Inc., Alphabet Inc., Facebook, Inc., Intel Corporation, NVIDIA Corporation, Visa Inc., Broadcom Inc., and T-Mobile US Inc.
